headline.main: U.S. GIVES SOVIET $30,000,000 CREDIT; Allots Second Sum Against a Gold Delivery -- Other Plans of Help Are Speeded Up

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 20 -- The speeding-up of United States aid to Russia in the present critical phase of the war was signalized by an announcement today that the government had advanced the Soviet Union $30,000,000 out of the Stabilization Fund against gold that Russia would send to this country.
abstract: U S Treas makes 2d advance against gold deliveries
